item.sql: INSERT INTO map_model_file_info (mfi_cus_number , mfi_file_id , mfi_file_pid , mfi_file_name , mfi_file_type , mfi_file_title , mfi_file_order , mfi_file_path , mfi_file_flag , mfi_file_attr , mfi_create_uid , mfi_create_datetime, mfi_update_uid , mfi_update_datetime) VALUES (:cus_number, :id , :pid , :name , :mfi_file_type , :mfi_file_title, :mfi_file_order, :mfi_file_path , :mfi_file_flag , :mfi_file_attr , :create_uid , SYSDATE , :update_uid , SYSDATE)

UPDATE map_model_file_info SET mfi_cus_number = :cus_number, mfi_file_pid = :pid, mfi_file_id = :id, mfi_file_name = :name, mfi_file_type = :mfi_file_type, mfi_file_title = :mfi_file_title, mfi_file_order = :mfi_file_order, mfi_file_path = :mfi_file_path, mfi_file_flag = :mfi_file_flag, mfi_file_attr = :mfi_file_attr, mfi_dept_id = :mfi_dept_id, mfi_load_flag = :mfi_load_flag, mfi_update_uid = :update_uid, mfi_update_datetime = SYSDATE

item.where: WHERE mfi_file_id IN (SELECT mfi_file_id FROM map_model_file_info START WITH mfi_file_id = ? CONNECT BY mfi_file_pid = PRIOR mfi_file_id)

item.sql: SELECT mfi_cus_number AS cus_number, mfi_file_pid AS pid, mfi_file_id AS id, mfi_file_title , mfi_file_name AS name, mfi_file_order FROM map_model_file_info

SELECT a.mfi_cus_number AS cus_number, a.mfi_file_pid AS pid, b.mfi_file_name AS pname, a.mfi_file_id AS id, a.mfi_file_name AS name, a.mfi_file_type, a.mfi_file_title, a.mfi_file_order, a.mfi_file_path, a.mfi_file_flag, a.mfi_file_attr, a.mfi_dept_id, a.mfi_load_flag, a.mfi_create_uid AS create_uid, a.mfi_create_uid AS create_user, TO_CHAR(a.mfi_create_datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS create_datetime, a.mfi_update_uid AS update_uid, a.mfi_update_uid AS update_user, TO_CHAR(a.mfi_update_datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS update_datetime FROM map_model_file_info a LEFT JOIN map_model_file_info b ON a.mfi_file_pid = b.mfi_file_id
